title: Starred emails
creator: kimberly16
content:
Hi Thunderbirds!

When I "Star" an email it disappears out of Inbox completely and I can only see it if I click on the "Star" option in the sorting menu. I've looked to see if there is a "Starred" folder but can't find one. I've now discovered that if someone replies to an email that I've starred I get no notification at all, it is just added to the thread. The next time I sort by Star I suddenly see unread replies to previously starred emails - bit of a nightmare! So, is there a way that I can adjust settings to: 1. Leave starred messages in the Inbox (or the folder that I move them to), but allow me to sort by Star when I need to? 2. Have new replies to previously starred messages appear as new notifications, the same way they do for normal emails.

Thanks! Kimberly

title: Server type
creator: gailsmailplace
content: I'd like to make sure that my Thunderbird is in the server type of IMAP I'm new at this so I don't know how it is connected to a another server email which I would eventually like to close out and delete but keep everything in my Thunderbird.
